HTTP DELETE requests

HTTP DELETE requests

Examples

(x <- HttpClient$new(url = "https://httpbin.org"))
#> <crul connection> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org
#>   curl options: 
#>   proxies: 
#>   auth: 
#>   headers: 

## a list
(res1 <- x$delete('delete', body = list(hello = "world"), verbose = TRUE))
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/delete
#>   request_headers: 
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:11:56 GMT
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.00167107582092
#>     content-length: 533
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 200
jsonlite::fromJSON(res1$parse("UTF-8"))
#> $args
#> named list()
#> 
#> $data
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $files
#> named list()
#> 
#> $form
#> $form$hello
#> [1] "world"
#> 
#> 
#> $headers
#> $headers$Accept
#> [1] "*/*"
#> 
#> $headers$`Accept-Encoding`
#> [1] "gzip, deflate"
#> 
#> $headers$Connection
#> [1] "close"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Length`
#> [1] "145"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Type`
#> [1] "multipart/form-data; boundary=------------------------dafaa88ba69e3b8c"
#> 
#> $headers$Expect
#> [1] "100-continue"
#> 
#> $headers$Host
#> [1] "httpbin.org"
#> 
#> $headers$`User-Agent`
#> [1] "libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110"
#> 
#> 
#> $json
#> NULL
#> 
#> $origin
#> [1] "157.130.179.86"
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://httpbin.org/delete"
#> 

## a string
(res2 <- x$delete('delete', body = "hello world", verbose = TRUE))
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/delete
#>   request_headers: 
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:11:56 GMT
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.0013370513916
#>     content-length: 465
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 200
jsonlite::fromJSON(res2$parse("UTF-8"))
#> $args
#> named list()
#> 
#> $data
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $files
#> named list()
#> 
#> $form
#> $form$`hello world`
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> 
#> $headers
#> $headers$Accept
#> [1] "*/*"
#> 
#> $headers$`Accept-Encoding`
#> [1] "gzip, deflate"
#> 
#> $headers$Connection
#> [1] "close"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Length`
#> [1] "11"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Type`
#> [1] "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
#> 
#> $headers$Host
#> [1] "httpbin.org"
#> 
#> $headers$`User-Agent`
#> [1] "libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110"
#> 
#> 
#> $json
#> NULL
#> 
#> $origin
#> [1] "157.130.179.86"
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://httpbin.org/delete"
#> 

## empty body request
x$delete('delete', verbose = TRUE)
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/delete
#>   request_headers: 
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:11:56 GMT
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.000946998596191
#>     content-length: 439
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 200
